title: Shifting White House coronavirus plans, plus Biden Veep-stakes: Marc Caputo & Juana Summers
description: Politico's Marc Caputo and NPR's Juana Summers join Chuck Todd to talk about the impact of shifting COVID response plans, and Joe Biden's vice presidential options.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
